happy.title: When You're Web-Slinging High!
happy.message: Your smile is brighter than Times Square at night! Just like Spidey saving the day, your happiness is contagious!
happy.note: I'd take you swinging through the city right now if I could!

sad.title: When the Suit Feels Heavy
sad.message: Even Spider-Man has days when the mask feels too heavy. Wrap yourself in this virtual hug - tighter than Doc Ock's tentacles but way more comforting!
sad.note: I saved the last piece of Aunt May's wheatcakes for this moment.

angry.title: When Someone Stole Your Pizza
angry.message: Channel that inner Hulk energy! Want me to send you funny memes of J. Jonah Jameson or should we roast the situation together?
angry.note: P.S. It was me. I ate your pizza. I'm sorry.

nostalgic.title: When You Miss Our Earlier Days
nostalgic.message: Remember when we first met? You were more awkward than Peter Parker asking out MJ. Now look at us - your nerdy charm worked its magic!
nostalgic.note: I kept your first text message. It was terrible. I love it.

birthday.title: SPECIAL BIRTHDAY MESSAGE!
birthday.message: Happy Birthday to my favorite web-head! Today we celebrate YOU - the amazing person who saves my day more than Spidey saves NYC!
birthday.note: im sorry, you deserve so much better than this stupid app but atleast we moved a step up from the html-css web news page ;-;

default.title: Just Because
default.message: No matter what mood you're in today, just know: if you were a Marvel character, you'd definitely be the hero who gets the happy ending.
default.note: Yes, this is my way of saying I think you're awesome.

memories: we stayed up until 3am watching Spider-Verse movies
you tried to cook and set off the smoke alarm
we got caught in the rain and danced instead of running
you talked about radioactive spiders for 20 minutes straight
we slow-danced in the kitchen to no music at 2am
